Liberty Bell Moving | Movers in Maine and New Hampshire > Moving Services > Piano Movers

Piano Movers

Professional Piano Movers

Liberty Bell Moving & Storage has professional piano movers. Our piano movers are highly trained and know the best techniques to break down and transport your piano with care. All of our Piano movers undergo extensive training before taking on the task. Pianos are extremely heavy and their finishes are very vulnerable to scratches, nicks and dents. Even a small upright piano can weigh more than 350 pounds. Grand pianos can easily weigh over 1,000 pounds, and older upright pianos tend to be top heavy, making them unstable and more difficult to move. You want a piano moving company that is willing to put forth the extra effort into making sure your piano arrives in perfect condition. You can rest assure that your piano will arrive in perfect condition.

Liberty Bell Moving & Storage specializes in the following moving services:
  • Local Moving
  • Long Distance Moving
  • Pool Table Movers
  • Piano Movers
  • Fitness Equipment Movers
  • Storage Facilities
  • Packing
  • White Glove Delivery
